reviews.review:
This is a fantastic game! Yes, get it.  If by some chance you are actually reading this review it is because you are unsure.  Don't be.  Just buy the game.   That is unless you do not like thinking and puzzle solving....if that is the case... Doom!

Enjoy.

Знаете что я вам скажу?
КУДА СТАВИТЬ ЭТОТ ТУПОЙ ПОРТАЛ?
10.10

Yes.


Oh thats not enough?

I love this game, so much. The backstory and hidden secrets capture my attention. YES YOU SHOULD BUY IT! The puzzles arent that hard, well some might be, but when you figure them out you feel complete... But! YES BUY IT! This game is amazing, really, i dont want to give much away in the game its self. You gotta lose yourself in it and look for hidden clues, hints, then when yout hink you found one, look it up and find a whole huge backstory on it. It's amazing to go through it and figure out all the secrets.

Co Ops nice too.. trolling your buddy is fun. "Oh you want me to stand here and give you a bridge?.. okay! -moves when friend is on it, friend falls to death- HAHHH!" <-- the life of Co OP, ruing friendships but its worth the laugh.

8/10
优点：
1.不错的关卡设计，场景也漂亮，作为解谜游戏，难度稍微有些简单也还凑活
2.长度适当的流程，故事流程代入感强

缺点：
1.玩家自由发挥的空间和彩蛋有点少（可能是我没找到）
2.主角传送枪使用方式有点单调啊，有些地图里打敌人，我就不能扔点东西过去什么的么？用手扔也行啊，简直不科学！

Glados bırak bi peşimi ya ne zaman girsem direk bana satışıyorsun yanimdaki elemani biraktim niye ben 

Şaka bir yana oyun dostlarınızla takılacağınız çok güzel bir oyun tavsiyem %100
Эта головоломка очень интересная и я ей ставлю 5/5

Un jeux tous simplement génial . Des graphismes époustouflants et des énigmes plus dures les une que les autres (comme ma..) . J'ai recommencer l'histoire plusieurs fois pour trouver tous les easter eggs ! Et le mode coop et très bien aussi ! Je le conseille !
非常有趣

Amazing story amazing game.Multiplayer and can create and share and play levels with you're friends or by your self made by friends or random people. Amazing buy :) Would reccomend to a friend.
EDIT: This game was ahead of its time so amazing, we need a third game!

dardy
操作简单，目标明确，还提供联机模式，总体来说是个很不错的游戏，就是对于我这种智商的来说有难度，用大半天的时间来研究一道传送门到底开在哪也算是一种乐趣吧……
Toujour un tres bon jeu
我同学说这是需要智商才能玩的游戏。
Such a great game,could be very challenging,and an overall great fun.
Put that thing back where it came from and please help me where does it go oh no
Great game 10/10
Uno de los mejores juegos jamas creados, nada más que decir, buena historia, multijugador divertido y mapas practicamente ilimitados. ¿Qué más se puede pedir?

I cried at the ending of the Portal and Portal 2. The story was beautiful, the gameplay was awesome, had great humour and confusing puzzles.
I remember playing this game when I was young and I was playing Portal and hearing a mysterious voice my character woke up on a futuristic bed. When putting that box onto the button and walking through that door I knew I was going to be playing that game for while and the satisfaction from solving a puzzle was real.
As I finished the game and was taken to that room with robots and the cake was there, I had so many mixed feelings and was crying to how beautiful it was.
And then onto Portal 2, when that was released I had high hopes that it was going to be an amazing game, I was NOT wrong. The gameplay was better, the story was more explaining, the puzzles were more confusing, and I still get nostalgia to this day. 10/10 would cry infront of my family again.
the game is challenging but not too hard to make you wanna give up, plus it has an intriguing story and subtle humor. a must buy for everyone.

Portal 2, indiscutiblemente una verdadera joya. Su historia es una pasada, de las mejores que he jugado y vaya que he jugado una gran variedad de juegos, pero la de este juego pffffff... Sin palabras ;)

11/10
Just get the game already. I didnt play much and I love it. 11/10
Why are you reading this review, buy this game!

DO NOT PRESS THE THUMBS DOWN BUTTON!

DO NOT PRESS THAT BUTTON!!!

"How have you been? I've been really busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED ME. Okay. Look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret.But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster."
                                                                                                                                                                                        - GLaDOS
I bought portal and portal 2 together to play all the way through. I beat portal 1 in 2 sessions. It is wonderful but portal 2 is so much better.  It takes the things that made portal so good and improves on them and it adds a few new mechanics and characters that make it feel like a story as much as a game. Wheatley was perfectly done and GLaDOS was even better. I'm about halfway through the game and i have to say how wonderful it is. The humor and puzzles are just brillant. 
This is probably one of my favorite games so yes i truly RECOMMEND this game. Hell, yes.
Great puzzles and even greater multiplayer trolling.
Great puzzle game on its own and the communities maps only help to make the game shine brighter. Definitely give the game a shot if you get the chance.
the novelty of the game makes sure you never get bored.

Is a unusual game... I loved!

Portal is a game of pure logic, with a good soundtrack, good graphics, and a amazing story, very funny. The cooperative mode is also good, although currently finding partners for playing is a little difficult. Unfortunately the more you play less challenging the game becomes, because you will remember how to complete the rooms, but luckily you can always find new challenges made by players in the community workshop! Continue Testing!

SPAAAACE!
Sehr sehr gutes Spiel habe es zwar gerade mal knapp 4 Stunden gespielt aber war von der ersten Minute an begeistert!

Na początku gra jest łatwa i uspokajająco spokojna, ale później zaczyna się pod górkę kiedy dochodzą mordercze wieżyczki i lasery.
W grze znajdują się dwie opcje gry dla jednej osoby i dla dwóch graczy przez połączenie internetowe.
Polecam oba tryby gry.
legit
is a ggoooood game budddddy :)

Прекрасная игра от разроботчиков всем известной серии Half-Life,которая запомнится вам хоть не до конца жизни,но на значительный промежуток времени,здесь есть все что нужно:Шикарный сюжет,головоломки разных сложностей(от элементарных до сложных и не сразу понятных),колоритные персонажи ,множество комических сцен и конечно лицо всей серии GLaDOS(которая после середины будет нашим спутником),плюс новый глав гад(никаких спойлеров).
Единственный минус в том что ближе к концу головоломки приедаются и решать их как то не хочется.
А так игра маст хев для любителей головоломок и Valve(ну и для новичков норм)
Was a fantastic game. Go it during the steam sale bundled with some other valve games. Was more than worth the money paid for it. Fantastic story all of the chracters were great.
今年の5月ごろに購入して遊んでいますが実績や隠し要素、テストの自作などまだまだ遊びきれてないです。この値段の割にこれだけボリュームがあるのはかなりお得ですし、かなり作りこまれていてすごくおすすめです。

Еще в первой части, запустив игру она мне понравилось. Создавать порталы, с помощью портальной пушки, оказалась  увлекательным занятием. Вторая часть более увлекательная чем первая. Здесь есть многое: классный сюжет, хорошие логические головоломки, хороший юмор и многое другое. Хорошая игра на логическое мышление
대가리 안돌면 하지마시길
GRAN VIDEOJUEGO
best game ever!!!!

Extremely fun cooperative gameplay.

Also, so easy to troll your friends in this game.

10/10 would make my friend fall to his death again.
its a great game!
This game is amazing and I recommend it to anyone valve please make another portal I love the series!!! :)

When you've completed single player, and co-op, you've only scratched the surface.

Arguably the best part of Portal 2 is the community maps, which offer new, innovative puzzles everytime.

I bought this game [i]just[/i] before it went on sale, but I'd happily pay the full price now.

Jogo sensacional e viciante!

Não existe monotonia no passar das fases e a dificuldade é crescente conforme o passar da história. O sarcasmo presente nas narrativas, textos e falas é incrível e torna o jogo divertido.
das Game ist ql

Just a fantastic game that's not too long, but invigorating and exciting for every second. 
10/10

10/10 just completed the ending was great whens the next portal out, made me smile very well made, challenging  and funny at the same time i do miss the days of finding ways to beat the levels and playing with freinds on co-op

Amazing game i highly suggest this!
Fun puzzly game it messes whith your brain it is so confusing and fun though!

Un grand classique des jeux PC. De très beaux graphismes, un gameplay bien pensé, une histoire et des dialogues bien écrits, avec une petite pointe d'humour et très fun en coop. Je recommande très fortement ce jeu ;)
GLaDOS is my waifu. <3

that game change my gaming life.. wow best game!
只给好评，不说话。

When I played this game, I saw that this game is MUCH BETTER than the first! It even has a puzzlemaker, which gives you the ability to make your own puzzles, even if they aren't! and the visuals, they are AMAZING! And it has a cooperative mode, which lets you play with a friend, doing tests together! And, more comedy in the game!

in general, Portal 2 is EVEN BETTER than Portal, so I DO Recommend it!

ich kann dieses Spiel für jeden empfehlen der eine mischung aus einer richtig guten Story,Schweren Rätseln und einfahlreichen Humor mag.Dieses Spiel macht extrem süchtig und hat auch kein Ende da die Commuinity immer neue Testkammern baut.Die 20 Euro haben sich echt gelohnt.

12/10, one of the best games ever made. Both the single player and the coop mode with a great story. 

Totally worth the buy.

The storyline is pretty fucked up bc she killed glados twice, but other than that, the new items such as speed gel, bounce gel and others are pretty cool. ANDDDDD we get to test our custom made chambers too, so its definitely much better than the first Portal.
игру стоит купить хотя бы из за кооперативной компании, которая отличается от одиночного прохождения. советую
本来是看好评加打折+1的游戏，女朋友玩了后推荐我试一下，7小时通关后有种酣畅淋漓的感觉，很少还有游戏还能让我这样了，作为一个老游戏，我确实得承认游戏非常棒，但是讲道理，G胖，这样的游戏你不出第三部？哪怕做得不好情怀消费也有不少的

Meh.

I highly recommened this game if you have played Portal 1 which I have but even if you have not played Portal 1 I still recommend this game to anyone looking to have a great time. Enjoyed the humor in the game a lot and the gameplay itself. I am very glad I had played this game had a lovely time and would highly recommened this anyone.
The best game I have ever played! (although i only have 11 games on my computer...)

I've followed the game for a long time and was so exited to see it go on summer sale! Overall, I can't say anything thats not already been said. Amazing!

[h1]零攻略通关纪念评测[/h1]
在我的印象中传送门系列似乎是一种永远过不去的游戏，可能是一代带来的影响[spoiler] 到目前为止一代我还卡在18关	[/spoiler]但2代似乎难度降低了很多，大概几天时间就能通关，当然我感触最深的还是游戏剧情[spoiler] 为了不剧透就不细说了[/spoiler]通关后的音乐依旧非常好听，但感觉不如一代的Still Alive好听[spoiler] 不要吐槽，虽然没有通关一代但可以上网查找	[/spoiler]总之在我看来，这是一部非常好的游戏作品，一点都不愧对68元的价格[spoiler] 虽然我是夏促入的	[/spoiler]
+优秀的剧情
+关卡的设计
+美妙的音乐
+感觉通关后智商都提高了一个档次
+合作模式
+创意工坊无数地图
-[u]3D眩晕的人不适合这款游戏，慎重！！[/u]
-有的关卡略显重复，玩着会很累
-有的关卡地图很大，会绕晕
9.5/10

Nearly perfect game, very entertaining, forcing you to use your brain. The part in the underground is not such a fun, but I love the lab levels. Closer to the end I was quite struggling to solve some of the puzzles, but the solution is usually quite simple, it just takes time to see it.
I really really like this game! You should download it, and its very fun when you play with friends too.

The best puzzle game money can buy, If your on the edge about getting it, then just buy it you won't regret it. if you havent played the first game however you should, seeing as how this is the sequel.


11/10 best game

Why did it ever have to end ?
Had a blast playin' it ,one of the best games I've ever played in my life,and certainly the best game valve has ever made.
10/10 would buy and cry again.

when attempting to use the multiplayer setting, I connected my keyboard, and a second controller. For some reason, the game doesn't understand that there is another controller connected. FIX YOUR FUCKING GAME! other than that, the compelling puzzles, and somewhat beautiful graphics make for a great game. I suggest it to anyone who doesn't want to play a multiplayer game with someone next to you.
GENIAL

After 15 hours of puzzle solving and wrapping my mind around the physics of the portal gun, I completed the game. And by far that was the most satisfying ending to any game I have ever played. I would also like to note that I never needed any help through my first playthrough. So if you are thinking about playing it, just remember, even if you are stuck in a lelvel, you will always be able to finish it.

10/10 Amazing

Great story. Witty characters. Clever puzzles.

The sequel is in all way better than the original, with new puzzle mechanics, and a decent backstory. Worth every penny, especially when it's on sale. 

Also, top-notch voice acting for Chell.
